title: Deals: Google Nest Hub bundle hits $150, Wemo Mini Smart Plug $19, more
content:
All of today’s deals are headlined by a Google Nest Hub 2nd Gen bundle that includes the latest Nest Cam Indoor for $150. That’s alongside Wemo’s Mini Smart Plug at $19 to go with and a $300 DJI FPV Drone discount. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Google Nest Hub bundle hits $150, Wemo Mini Smart Plug $19, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A notable Google Nest bundle discount has gone live with the Nest Hub 2nd Gen and an indoor Nest Cam for $150, plus more.
